name: Eigo App Studio
tag_list: mobile, development, retail, apps, business, iphone, android, blackberry, html5, windows, cross-platform
overview:
Since Eigo was founded in 1999 we have strived to deliver new technologies to the consumer by helping both brands and individuals alike. We are an industry leading cross platform mobile app developer team, specialising in iOS, Android and Blackberry development. We are a fresh thinking team who deliver innovative ideas and strategies on time every time.

Our dedicated team work hand in hand with the client to ensure that their every need is met from initial ideas to release and beyond. We are a versatile team and we pride ourselves on our versatility and professionalism. Constantly researching and learning new technologies we are always one step ahead to deliver to the needs of the consumer.
